page.title: 11 LEISURE
page.content: FAMILY LEISURE Out of one hundred and forty people surveyed most people enjoyed walking on the moors or the beach or in country side in their leisure time. Plym bridge woods is a favourite area. Many people did gardening in their leisure time and swimming was very popular as a hobby.Many people take part in clubs,sail or play regular sport.Reading and television are the most popular indoor past time,followed by D.I.Y and knitting. CHILDRENS LEISURE. In my leisure time I play tennis with my brother.Sometimes we play football with our friends.A third of our class prefer to stay in and play musical instruments or watch television.Two thirds of the class prefer to play outside on their bikes, or play football with their friends.
